Title: Silence the Court is in Session
Actors: Nandita Das, Saurabh Shukla, Abhay Mahajan, Swanand Kirkire
Plot: A mock trial during the rehearsal of a play quickly turns into a gripping drama about desire, gender issues, power and control, in this adaptation of playwright Vijay Tendulkar's Shantata. Court Chalu Aahe (1963).
